get_exposure[source]

get_exposure(config, files, gti, source, use_cache=True)

Return the exposure for the source If gti is None, regenerate it

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

The result is a tuple of time intervals and the exposure

{% raw %}

get_contiguous_exposure[source]

get_contiguous_exposure(exposure, max_interval=10, verbose=0)

Combine exposure intervals from an exposure dataframe return array of (start, stop) pairs
